mrbles.report¶

Quality Control Report Classes and Functions¶

This file stores the quality control report classes and functions for the MRBLEs Analysis module.

Functions

circle_overlay(image[, dims, ring]) Circle Overlay Image.
cluster3d_check
image_overlay(image, image_blend[, alpha, …]) Overlay 2 Images.

Classes

BeadsReport(data, images, masks, assay_channel) Per-MRBLE images report.
Cluster
GenerateCodes(colors, s0s, slopes, nsigma) Generate bead code set.
PeptideScramble(seq) Randomizes amino acid sequence
QCReport(data) MRBLE library Quality Control report.
